act:
775591 THE AIRCRAFT (AMENDMENT) ACT, 2000
ACT NO. 51 OF 2000 [ 11th December, 2000]
An Act further to amend the Aircraft Act, 1934.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- first Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
701604 1 Short title and commencement.-
1437676 1This Act may be called the Aircraft (Amendment) Act, 2000.
847039 2It shall come into force on such date as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.
1452003 2Amendment of section 11A of Act 22 of 1934.- In section 11A of the Aircraft Act, 1934, for the words" with fine which may extend to one thousand rupees", the words" with fine which may extend to ten lakh rupees" shall be substituted. SUBHASH C. JAIN,
Secy. to the Govt. of India.
